io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel

Class GuildChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel.Channel
      • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel.GuildChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannel, IGuildChannel, ICreationTime, ISnowflake
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelCategory, TextChannel, VoiceChannel

    public class GuildChannel
extends Channel
implements IGuildChannel
    Represents any channel in a guild
    Author:
    Perry Berman

    • Field Detail

      • guild

        protected final IGuild guild
        The Guild the channel belongs to.
        This property must be null if the Channel.type of the channel is "dm", or "groupDM".
        Since:
        0.0.1

      • name

        protected String name
        The channel's name
